mapper.insert: INSERT INTO km_timeline_event ( event_type, title, description, event_date, topic_id, rec_creator, rec_create_time, arch_flag ) VALUES ( #{eventType}, #{title}, #{description}, #{eventDate}, #{topicId}, #{recCreator}, NOW(), 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM km_timeline_event WHERE id = #{id} AND arch_flag = 1
SELECT * FROM km_timeline_event WHERE event_type = 'global' AND arch_flag = 1 ORDER BY event_date DESC, rec_create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM km_timeline_event WHERE event_type = 'milestone' AND arch_flag = 1 ORDER BY event_date DESC, rec_create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM km_timeline_event WHERE event_type = 'milestone' AND topic_id = #{topicId} AND arch_flag = 1 ORDER BY event_date DESC, rec_create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE km_timeline_event SET arch_flag = 0, rec_revisor = #{recRevisor}, rec_revise_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE km_timeline_event SET arch_flag = 0, rec_revisor = #{revisor}, rec_revise_time = NOW() WHERE event_type = 'milestone' AND topic_id = #{topicId} AND arch_flag = 1

UPDATE km_timeline_event SET event_type = #{eventType}, title = #{title}, description = #{description}, event_date = #{eventDate}, topic_id = #{topicId}, rec_revisor = #{recRevisor}, rec_revise_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
